trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when role validation fails due to a specified identity that is not contained in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRoleCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRoleCollection" />에 포함되어 있지 않은 지정된 ID로 인해 역할 유효성 검사가 실패한 경우 throw되는 예외입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowAuthorizationException" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowAuthorizationException" /> class.
The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowAuthorizationException" /> class using the specified message.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 메시지를 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowAuthorizationException" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: throw되는 예외에 대해 serialize된 개체 데이터를 보유하는 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 소스 또는 대상에 대한 컨텍스트 정보를 포함하는 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowAuthorizationException" /> class by using serialized data.
trans-unit.target: serialize된 데이터를 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowAuthorizationException" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowAuthorizationException" /> class by using the specified message and <see cref="T:System.Exception" />.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 메시지와 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowAuthorizationException" />을 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> in which the exception occurred.
The name of the user or entity on whose behalf the workflow authorization exception was thrown.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 인증 예외가 throw된 사용자 이름 또는 엔터티 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowAuthorizationException" /> class using the name of the activity and the principal.
trans-unit.target: 활동 및 주체 이름을 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowAuthorizationException" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.
